Hi, iv'e recently watched one of Macey Deans videos where he has a fight between some ships. At one point, he uses a "Heatseeking missile" which he controlls. This is what i mean. - http://youtu.be/c1s67QxUaIM?t=3m19s

I tried to do the same thing but as soon as i decoupled the "missile" it just became debris and i chouldn't do anything with it.

Any help?
You could add an unmanned control module, which would allow you to control the "missile" once it separates.
You would have to add a drone controller to the part that is being separated.
Also be sure to supply enough power for the probe part to run as long as you intend it to. A probe part without a battery will only run for a couple minutes.

But thats the thing, i have power and a unmanned pod, but i cant controll it. I know its possible but how do i do it? (Any key for switching between ships and/or debris etc.)

(Sorry for the late response).

"[" or "]" will switch object control.

Use the tracking station to select the object and delete it from tracking.
